subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: After a two-under-par 70 on Torrey Pines South allowed John Rollins to overtake Camilo Villegas for the tournament lead, he was the shining star of the day.
snippet: After a two-under-par 70 on Torrey Pines South allowed John Rollins to overtake Camilo Villegas for the tournament lead, he was the shining star of the day.
